result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eric George Kaster

Defendant Eric George Kaster appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Eric George Kaster.  
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Br. 11 has taken defendant' other misdemeanor and put it on their calendar.  Court orders this matter be added to Br 11 calendar.  Case is adjourned to Br. 11.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Defendant Eric George Kaster in court.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court for Eric George Kaster.  Attorney Michael R Staskunas in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status conference.  Parties stipulate to transfer of case to Branch 11.  Court accepts transfer.  Defense informs the court that defendant is trying to get into Veterans Treatment Court.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Case adjourned to Branch 11, Rm 608 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Eric George Kaster appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Eric George Kaster.  
Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Status conference held.  Defendant has a felony case and Atty. Plummer needs to review the global offer with his client. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8-22-22, filed.  rmm
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense

Defendant Eric George Kaster in court.  Katrina Amy Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Eric George Kaster appeared by phone via zoom. Defendant has not retained counsel. Court appoints Attorney Matthew Plummer as counsel for defendant at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Attorney Matthew Plummer accepts appointment.  Defendant shall reimburse Milwaukee County at the rate of $100.00 on the 1st of every month, commencing 08/01/2022 until paid in full. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means. Case is adjourned in Branch 01.  Status conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7-14-22, filed.  rmm

Defendant Eric George Kaster in court.  Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for status. Defendant has retained a private attorney but asks for a brief adjournment to allow defense counsel to appear with him. 
Case adjourned back to Br 01.  Status conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Eric George Kaster in court.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Matter set for scheduling conference.  Defendant does not qualify for a public defender and requests time to retain counsel.  Court granted the request.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5.16.22, filed.  rmm

5/3/2022

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision level 5.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  Scram bracelet ordered to monitor defendant maintains absolute sobriety.  No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Eric George Kaster in court with attorney William Anthony Rakestraw.  Defendant Eric George Kaster in custody.  Emily S Zimmel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Eric George Kaster appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant has lower number case(s) pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
